text: Thomas Henry Charles Parker Bowles (/bo älz/; born 18 December 1974) is a British food writer and food critic. ==Work, family and life== Parker Bowles is the author of seven cookbooks and won the Food Writers Guild Award in 2010 for his work on British food. He is known for being a judge on numerous TV food series and reviewing UK and overseas restaurant dining for GQ, Esquire and The Mail on Sundays. He is the sibling of Laura Lopes, son of Andrew Parker Bowles and Camilla, Queen Consort and godchild and stepchild of King Charles III. Category:Living people Category:1974 births Category:Writers from London
title: Tom Parker Bowles
